parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.26

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Camera Control

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Lock/Unlock stabilized camera (in vanilla used currently only for UAVs) to target.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> vehicle [[lockCameraTo]] [target, turretPath]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> vehicle: [[Object]] - UAV

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]] or [[PositionASL]] - use [[objNull]] for unlocking

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> turretPath: [[Array]] - path to the turret with required camera

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>uav [[lockCameraTo]] [vehicle, [0,0]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>uav [[lockCameraTo]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[objNull]], [0,0]]; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>unlocks the turret</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[camTarget]] [[camSetTarget]] [[camPrepareTarget]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on April 10, 2015 - 06:54 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Commy2|Commy2]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
The vehicle has to have a stabilized optic for this command to work with ASL position.
</dd>

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
</comment></dl></root>
